issue.title: [Java] Implement vector validate functionality
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-8020](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-8020). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
In C++ side, we already have array validate functionality but no similar functionality in Java side.

This issue is about to implement this functionality.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-8020?focusedCommentId=17107915) by Micah Kornfield (emkornfield@gmail.com):*
